name: context-manager
description: Provides asynchronous error handling and improved stack traces in JavaScript applications.

scripts.build:dev: r.js.cmd -o optimize=none baseUrl=src paths.error-stack-parser=empty: paths.lodash=empty: paths.angular=empty: shim.angular.eports=angular shim.lodash.exports=_ name=../node_modules/almond/almond include=index out=build/cm.js wrap.startFile=wrap.start.txt wrap.endFile=wrap.end.txt
scripts.build:prod: r.js.cmd -o baseUrl=src paths.error-stack-parser=empty: paths.lodash=empty: paths.angular=empty: shim.angular.eports=angular shim.lodash.exports=_ name=../node_modules/almond/almond include=index out=build/cm.min.js wrap.startFile=wrap.start.txt wrap.endFile=wrap.end.txt
scripts.build: npm run-script build:dev && npm run-script build:prod

author: Paychex, Inc.
